actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill to amend the interest provisions of the Declaration of Taking Act.
short_title: Declaration of Taking Amendments Act of 1986

summary.text: Declaration of Taking Amendments Act of 1986 - Amends the Declaration of Taking Act (regarding the acquisition of land for public use) to provide for the calculation of interest by reference to the rates on one-year Treasury bills. Requires the Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to distribute notice of such rates to all Federal judges.

titles.title: Declaration of Taking Amendments Act of 1986
A bill to amend the interest provisions of the Declaration of Taking Act.
